question: [File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Memory exhaustion] Can accumulated FuturesUnordered entries consume unbounded memory if responses are never received? (High)
[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [CPU exhaustion] Can spinning in the select! loop without proper backoff cause excessive CPU usage? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [File descriptor exhaustion] Can creating many concurrent RPC connections exhaust system file descriptors? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Channel buffer overflow] Can subscriber_rx channel buffer overflow if batches arrive faster than they can be processed? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: new()] [Misconfiguration attack] Can validators be initialized with different retry_interval_ms values causing timing discrepancies and consensus issues? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: new()] [Parameter injection] Can external inputs influence retry_limit or request_num_peers to inject malicious configuration values? (High)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: new()] [Validator set mismatch] If validator_verifier doesn't match the actual validator set in responders, can this cause verification failures? (High)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Empty responders] If responders BTreeSet is empty, will next_request_peers() panic or return None causing immediate failure? (High)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Single responder] If responders contains only one peer and that peer is Byzantine, can the batch ever be retrieved? (High)
[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Maximum digest] If digest is HashValue with all bits set to 1, can this cause hash collision or lookup issues? (Low)
[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Zero expiration] If expiration is 0, can all NotFound responses immediately trigger batch expiration? (Medium)
[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Maximum epoch] If epoch is u64::MAX, can this cause comparison or arithmetic issues in epoch validation? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: next_request_peers()] [Single validator] If signers.len() is 1, does the round-robin logic work correctly or can it cause infinite loops? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Counter poisoning] Can malicious validators trigger specific error paths to manipulate counters and mislead operators? (Low)
[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Log injection] Can attacker-controlled digest values in debug! logs inject malicious log entries? (Low)
[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Metric accuracy] Are counters incremented atomically or can race conditions cause inaccurate metrics? (Low)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Monitor macro failure] If the monitor! macro at line 117 fails to start, does the function silently continue or return an error? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Request semantics] Does BatchRequest::new() at line 120 create semantically valid requests that all validators will accept? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Response validation] Are all three BatchResponse variants (Batch, NotFound, BatchV2) handled according to protocol specification? (High)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Epoch boundary] During epoch transitions, can request_batch() continue operating or does it need to be reinitialized? (High)
[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Protocol version] Does the function handle protocol version mismatches between requesters and responders? (Medium)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Payload corruption] Can batch.into_transactions() return corrupted transaction data if the network transmission was corrupted? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Digest verification] After receiving a batch, is the digest recomputed and compared to the requested digest? (Critical)

[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Transaction ordering] Does into_transactions() preserve transaction ordering, or can malicious reordering affect execution? (High)
[File: consensus/src/quorum_store/batch_requester.rs] [Function: request_batch()] [Partial batch] Can responders send partial batch content causing incomplete transaction execution? (High)
